creator: rob.devos@tno.nl
text:
It would be nice to be able to connect an alarm to a stream of messages from a
logging source and let the alarm go off when there are no message's received
within a specified time.
It should also be possible to turn on/off the alarm based on time of day,
because the alarm shouldn't go off at night.

A feature like this can be very use full to monitor the availability of a server
that is being used as a WebServer.

creator: psmith@apache.org
text:
Chainsaw is designed to allow you to monitor logging events, it's not a
monitoring agent per-se.

I would recomend Performance Co-Pilot instead(PCP).

http://oss.sgi.com/projects/pcp/

A fantastic monitoring agent with alarming built in (see the inference engine
pmie built in).
